singleItemContent: p>Do you like to take photographs?
p>What do you like to photograph?
p>How did you become imterested in photography?
p>How do you keep your photos?
p>Do you eve delete or, if on paper, throw away any of your photos?
p>Describe a time you visited a new place.
p>And explain how did you feel about the place?
p>Which one do you prefer, living in a city or only visiting it as a tourist?
p> How do children react when they go to a new school for the first time?
p>How do young and old people react differently to new things?
p>Why do some people want to go to colleges that are far away from home?
